price: Da yawa waɗanda suka kãfirta suke gũrin dã dai sun kasance Musulmi.*
arabic: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡ كَانُواْ مُسۡلِمِينَ
footnotes: * Kõwane kãfiri yanã gũrin yã zama Musulmi dõmin abin da yake gani na shiriya da ladubban Musulunci, waɗanda ya tabbata bãbu zama lãfiya ga mutum fãce idan yã sãme su, amma shaiɗan yanã hana shi musulunta sabõda waɗansu dalĩlai da yake sanyãwa a ganinsa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: rubamā yawaddu alladhīna kafarū law kānū mus'limīna
